sentences.sContent: ...a society which was politically quiescent and above all deferential.
sentences.sCn: ...一个遵循顺从至上及政治上平静的社会。

synos.tran: 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的

remMethod.val: qui(=quiet安静的) ＋ escent(状态) → 静止的

trans.tranOther: not developing or doing anything, especially when this is only a temporary state
